title: Lux's R
body: 40% of the times when i press ult as lux it just goes the opposite direction, pls riot look into it...

replies.body: Hmm, you  aren't by chance having the cursor kite near your champ or hover over map right? Cause it's happened quite a few times that I completely whiff the ult in the wrong direction  similar to {{champion:22}} {{champion:39}} ,{{summoner:4}} while trying to kite backwards like it can't tell if your cursor is ahead of you or behind you as you maybe ult faster before it registers the direction you're looking/hovering at feels pretty bad to slip up in a rush.
